main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in the sky over Grantsville, Maryland on June 27, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as being approximately 100-150 ft in size and bright reddish orange in color., It moved in a northerly direction at a high rate of speed and disappeared from view in seconds., The sighting lasted for about 5-10 minutes., The object was compared in brilliance to a medium-size star but was steadier and brighter., No sound was associated with the object, and it was thought to be under intelligent control.
sighted object: a circular, bright reddish orange UFO
witness description: A resident of Grantsville, Maryland, described as a sober, reliable person.
